nodes.text: Dalan Reid was a male veteran identity slicer. Reid spent twelve years in isolation due to the high illegality of his job, developing personality quirks that eventually led to mental imbalance. Afterward, using local wildlife, he began constructing replicas of Viella Zall, a singer on the HoloNet galactic communications grid. Having made dozens of replicas, Reid used them for an impromptu concert on the planet Tatooine, where he was caught by 3630 BBY.

Dalan Reid was mentioned in the Codex entry for Identity Slicers in the 2015 expansion Knights of the Fallen Empire to the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released by BioWare in 2011.
